Locale.Value:
1. [*]Kernel upgrade: 109.0.5414.62
2. [!]Correction of some problems and optimization of details
3. [!]Repair the abnormal tab bar switching when there are tab groups
4. [!]Fix the exception of moving the vertical tab to a new window
5. [*]M109 Solves a security authorization vulnerability (if necessary, the security cache directory safe_temp will be created under the path% ProgramFiles%)
6. [+]Show/hide tab separators for a more recognizable tab bar appearance
7. [+]Mouse gesture support setting exception
8. [+]Vertical tab bar supports window floating
9. [+]The flexible download window automatically memorizes the last download tool and save path parameters

1. [*]内核升级：109.0.5414.62
2. [!]若干问题修正与细节优化
3. [!]修复存在标签页群组时，标签栏切换异常
4. [!]修复垂直标签栏页将标签页移至新窗口显示异常
5. [*]m109 解决一个提权安全漏洞(如果有必要会在%ProgramFiles%路径下创建安全缓存目录 safe_temp)
6. [+]显示/隐藏 标签页分隔符，更高识别度的标签页栏外观
7. [+]鼠标手势支持设置例外
8. [+]垂直标签栏支持窗口浮动
9. [+]柔性下载窗口自动记忆最近一次使用 下载工具与保存路径 参数
